name: Violet's Dream VR
description: "Violet's Dream" (Chinese name "紫嫣的奇幻梦境") is a simulation to run cool and fly-based VR experience game, accompanied by real-time strong QTE system to enhance the player in the game scene empathy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7 Windows10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 Storage: 1000 MB available space Additional Notes: HTC VIVE
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7 Windows10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 Storage: 1000 MB available space Additional Notes: HTC VIVE
